Unleash Your Creativity This Summer!
Join us for our exciting Summer Camp and Workshop at Central Florida Performing Arts!
Enroll Now
Photo of the cast of ‚ÄúThe Jungle Book‚Äù
Summer 2025
This Summer...
SUMMER CAMP - Experience hands-on learning in acting, singing, and dancing while making new friends.
June 10-13 at the Orlando Science Center @5-8:30pm
Enroll Now
Orlando Theater Workshop - Perfect for serious students looking to enhance their skills
Must have finished grades 3-10
Weekend July 2025
Hampton Inn & Suites
Enroll Now
Our Team Is Ready To Create a Great Experience
These action-packed events are the best opportunity for theater stars to come together to learn in a fast-paced environment to learn, widen range, and make memories that last a lifetime. These engaging classes feature masters in the industry to bring real life performance experience to the classroom.
They will transform the way we think about our experience on and off stage to get the most out of the journey. A performance will be held at the end of camp and the workshop to showcase their amazing talents!
Every Child Shines at CFPA!
At CFPA, there‚Äôs a place for every child, from beginners to advanced performers. We believe that every child has the potential to shine on stage and build their confidence through performance.
Imagine watching your child truly excel in their element! No prior experience is necessary; every role is unique, and we guide kids to thrive at their own level while embracing their individual strengths. At CFPA, every child has the opportunity to shine and grow in a supportive and encouraging environment.
Enroll Now
What They Will Gain
Confidence
Think how your child‚Äôs confidence would progress if they had the opportunity to grow with real-life application.
New Skills
Picture them gaining invaluable skills in a supportive and fun environment, surrounded by peers and mentors.
Communication
Visualize how they would express themselves through dance, singing, and acting, developing lifelong talents.
Confidence
Think how your child‚Äôs confidence would progress if they had the opportunity to grow with real-life application.
New Skills
Picture them gaining invaluable skills in a supportive and fun environment, surrounded by peers and mentors.

Visualize how they would express themselves through dance, singing, and acting, developing lifelong talents.
SUMMER 2025
Register Here!
Summer Camp‚Äã
Our Promise: What‚Äôs Included in Summer Camp‚Äã
HOW IT WORKS: SUMMER CAMP
Our Summer Camp focuses on the magical musical *Cinderella*. The program begins with auditions, where students will showcase their talents and secure their roles. Over the course of the camp, participants will engage in daily classes, learning scenes and lines while developing their singing, dancing, and acting skills. In the final day, we will bring the production to life! Our approach mirrors a professional theater experience, blending creativity with fun, ensuring an unforgettable summer for every camper!
What's Included in Your Summer Camp
When you enroll in our Summer Camp, you're getting so much more than just classes! Here's what you can expect:
Musical Production
: Perform in the enchanting musical *Cinderella*.
Auditions
: Each child will go through auditions to secure their roles.
Scene Work
: Learn and practice scenes, complete with lines and character development.
Singing and Dancing
: Participate in daily classes focusing on singing and dancing.
Craft Activities
: Enjoy creative crafts related to the musical theme.
Fun Activities and Games
: Engage in acting games and fun activities to build teamwork and confidence.
Friendship Building
: Make lasting friendships with fellow campers.
Parent Portal Access
: Convenient access to materials and updates via our parent portal.
Rehearsal Videos
: Receive rehearsal videos to help practice at home.
Certificate of Achievement
: All participants will earn a certificate at the end of the camp!
We believe in providing our students and their families with a fulfilling experience. Join us for a summer of growth, creativity, and fun!
Orlando Theater Workshop
Elevate Your Skills
HOW IT WORKS: ORLANDO THEATER WORKSHOP
Our Orlando Theater Workshop is designed for serious theater and dance students aiming for lead roles. The weekend kicks off with audition classes where participants will showcase their talents. Throughout the workshop, students will experience a variety of specialized sessions, including acting, stage combat, and creative makeup. By the end of the workshop, students will gain invaluable insights into the responsibilities of being a lead and how to achieve it. Our professional approach fosters both growth and creativity, ensuring an inspiring experience for every participant!
What's Included in the Orlando Theater Workshop
Join us for an exciting weekend dedicated to serious theater and dance students ready to elevate their skills! Here‚Äôs what you can expect:
Advanced Training
: Intensive sessions designed for those aiming for lead roles and higher expectations.
Audition Classes
: Learn how to master auditions with techniques used by professionals.
Guest Teachers
: Experience classes with industry experts who have worked globally and achieved amazing careers.
Diverse Workshops
: Explore unique classes not typically offered, such as stage craft and stage combat.
Creative Classes
: Engage in improvisation, acting techniques, and even a makeup workshop!
Team Bonding
: Build lasting friendships with fellow aspiring artists during collaborative exercises.
Fun Activities
: Join in on engaging games and a pool party as a fun bonus to the weekend!
This workshop is designed to inspire growth, creativity, and confidence in serious performers. Don't miss out on this unique opportunity!

Sign up early to unlock these fantastic bonuses and set your child up for success!

Special Notes
Refund Policy
Due to the unique nature of our workshops and events, all registrations are final and non-refundable. We plan these special programs with limited availability and tailored experiences, so once you reserve your spot, we cannot accommodate refunds.
Summer 2025

Confidence. Friendship. A Stage To Grow On.

Contact us
.entry-header
We'd Love to Hear from You!
Phone: + 1 (701) 230-1993
Email: cfpabackstage@gmail.com
Central Florida Performing Arts
We meet Tuesdays inside the Orlando Science Center
Facebook-f
Instagram
Get to Know Us: Your Questions Answered!
FAQ
What is the Focus of Your Program?
CFPA is dedicated to enhancing children‚Äôs skills in theater, dance, and performance, helping them grow in confidence and creativity. Our mission is to help children regain their confidence, learn communication skills, and make friends!
Where do you meet?
Classes take place inside the Orlando Science Center weekly on Tuesdays.
Park in the OSC garage and walk across the tunnel. Enter through the right and go up to the 3rd floor. Take a right and keep walking around. There you will find us inside the Founders Room.
What ages do you cater to?
We offer programs for children in grades K-12. Kids will be divided up by age and skill level within the classes.
How can I enroll my child?
You can enroll your child through our website.
CLICK HERE
for the Registration Page
Do I have to pay for parking?
Nope! Our families have validated parking each week. You will get a parking ticket when you enter the garage. We will give you a QR code to scan when it‚Äôs time to exit the parking garage.
How do auditions work?
We know this is an important question, and audition processes can vary by program. To help clarify, we‚Äôve created a video that explains how our auditions are conducted.
CLICK HERE
to watch now.
